channel.title: [Urgent] Online Player Time
channel.description:
Currently I own a RSPS with about 50 players on at the moment, I need a feature added in the quest tab where it say's
"Online Playing Time: (How long they've played)"
How would I add this, searched for a tutorial but nothing came up. Thanks :)

item.title: [Urgent] Online Player Time
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

public String getUptime(){ RuntimeMXBean mx = ManagementFactory.getRuntimeMXBean(); DateFormat df = new SimpleDateFormat("HH 'hours', mm 'mins', ss 'seconds'"); df.setTimeZone(TimeZone.getTimeZone("GMT+0")); return "Online Playing Time: " + df.format(new Date(mx.getUptime())); }

I don’t know what base you’re using but you can do [size=8pt]c.getPA().sendFrame126(getUptime(), i);[/size] to print it.

Read full topic

item.title: [Urgent] Online Player Time
item.dc:creator: @Yesteryear Yesteryear
item.description:
@Yesteryear wrote:

Do you want the actual tab in the client or the logic behind getting the time played?
